clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Chemotherapy on Muscle Mass and Exercise Performance in Patients With Oesophageal Cancer.
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy on Muscle Mass and Peri-operative Cardiorespiratory Performance in Patients Undergoing Oesophageal Cancer- a Pilot Study

brief_summary.textblock: Curative treatment for oesophageal cancer involves undertaking chemotherapy followed by an operation to remove the tumour. Chemotherapy has several effects upon the body, including effects upon the systems that control the creation and breakdown of muscle. We aim to review these effects by recording changes in the amount of exercise patients are able to undertake after chemotherapy and reviewing changes in muscle mass.

detailed_description.textblock: We aim to review the effects of chemotherapy on skeletal muscle mass and cardio-respiratory performance in patients with oesophageal adenocarcinoma. All patients will be assessed by a Consultant Anaesthetist and a medical member of the Research team before commencing chemotherapy and after finishing their course. These assessments include a nutritional assessment, performance status assessments, blood assays, dual energy X-ray absorptiometry (DEXA) scans, cardio-pulmonary exercise (CPEX) testing and a muscle biopsy.

primary_outcome.description: variations in muscle mass during neoadjuvant chemotherapy

secondary_outcome.description: assess nutritional status post chemotherapy via serum protein levels.
Evidence of mortality and relate this to aerobic ability.
review changes in mitochondrial function after neoadjuvant chemotherapy
review changes in cardiorespiratory performance (peak VO2) after neoadjuvant chemotherapy

arm_group.description: DEXA scan cardio-pulmonary exercise testing (CPEX) muscle biopsy

intervention.description: all patients will undertake a full body DEXA scan before and after chemotherapy
All patients will have a muscle biopsy before and after chemotherapy
patients will undertake exercise in the form of an exercise bike whilst having their cardiac and ventilatory performance analysed. This will take place before and after neoadjuvant chemotherapy

biospec_descr.textblock: blood tests for serum albumin and total protien levels.

Exclusion Criteria:
